Class KarDoclet

    A doclet that creates documentation for KAR files.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl

      • isClassDeprecated

        public static boolean isClassDeprecated(java.lang.String className)
        Returns true if the given class name is deprecated. NOTE: this method does not look at the tags of the class; the doclet must be run on the source file first.

      • setGenerateForDeprecated

        public static void setGenerateForDeprecated(boolean generate)
        Set if documentation will be generated for deprecated classes.
